EmailTemplate.name: HT/TH 2014 - Final Payment Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Live Different Build 2014 - Final Payment Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Everyone!
This is just a reminder that your payment deadline is tomorrow so please try to make your payments today, unless you have been given an extension on your deadline.
You can do this by going on your Canada Helps page!
Have an amazing weekend!!!
Talk to all of you soon,
Joy Yu
